name: WATERDOG mobile
tag_list: mobile, development, design, mobile-development, mobile-design, interaction-design, user-experience
overview:
WATERDOG mobile is a Portuguese startup focused on mobile design and development.

It started as a group of mobile enthusiasts that believe this technology is and will keep changing our lives. Mobile technology is clearly evolving and WATERDOG mobile wants to be part of this growth from the beginning. How to do it? From our perspective, it is crucial to always care about what we do and aim at daily achievements as it feeds our motivation and drive.

WATERDOG mobile’s team is informally serious, responsible and honest. Our creativity and experience will deliver engaging mobile solutions from native applications (iOS, Android, WP7) to mobile web. For us, nothing is more fulfilling than seeing our creations being used.
